wischen_rechts: Last citation – Swipe right for previous citation
spruch_1: Mosher’s Law of Software Engineering: Don’t worry if it doesn’t work right. If everything did, you’d be out of a job.
spruch_2: Science is what we understand well enough to explain to a computer. Art is everything else we do.
spruch_3: The three golden rules to ensure computer security are: do not own a computer; do not power it on; and do not use it.
spruch_4: Andy Grove giveth and Bill Gates taketh away.
